_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Sunday, January 25, 5:05 a.m.  Wake up and bundle up! Apex Express, Moonbeam Express, and Link begin loading at 7:30 a.m. this morning for Ikon Pass holders. Temperatures will start the day in the single digits and rise into the teens later in the day. Skies will be a mix of clouds and sunshine with a flurry or two possible in the late afternoon. Frontside trails are skiing fast and firm right now (but are still plenty of fun, especially with edgy gear). Please check your speed and keep an eye out for other skiers and riders. Our grooming crew continues to mow down moguls and lay down fresh corduroy on 25+ groomed trails. The Main Street Terrain Park is in full effect with new features. Looking for adventure? Traverse the east face of Honeycomb Canyon in search of recrystallized powder stashes. Have a great Sunday at Solitude!
